website_summaries.verdict: A robust, realistic-looking tree of extremely high construction quality and build.
pros: Lush and full, without being excessively wide at its base
7 different height/size choices if 10' is too large for your home
cons: If you get a tall one, you will need a step ladder to decorate it

customer_reviews.title: The key is the FLUFF it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tree! It just takes a few moments to actually fluff it out before the tree looks full. I have included a before picture (right out of box) and after I fluffed it. Can't wait to put ornaments and lights on it!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Daigneau

customer_reviews.title: and it's pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This tree can withstand five pounds of cat climbing and sleeping in it. A+. Oh, and it's pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good value tree.
customer_reviews.text: Great tree and easy to assemble. I would recommend this tree to friends. Shipped fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tree for a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the negative reviews on this item, I was a bit skeptical, but went ahead and ordered it. I wanted a nice tree, but couldn't see spend hundreds on one. I'm glad to say that it's exactly what I was hoping for. The longest part was fluffing the tree limbs out, which took a couple of hours. But if you take the time to fluff them, it ends up looking full and beautiful. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to buy a new tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Joke
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. This tree is a joke. A good tree will have smaller groups of branches stemming from the main branch at the base. And the individual sprigs are also a joke. Not full at all. Yes, I know the tree needs to be fluffed, and I know how to fluff a tree. Do not purchase. Go get the T-25 from the big store that starts with a W. It’s the same size but 100% better quality and cheaper (my parents have it and it’s a great tree).
customer_reviews.author: Dana Moon

customer_reviews.title: Cute, little tree at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I adore the 4.5 ft height of this tree. I think the tree looks great propped up on a table (or in my case, a plastic storage bin covered with a tree skirt!). This little tree has a realistic shape, and the branches leave a perfect amount of space for hanging ornaments. A great tree for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Tree falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I only received the tree a couple weeks ago & branches are already falling off. I am only trying to put the lights on. When you try to shaped the branches they start to fall off! How is this going to last me even 1 year much less a few years which I would expect a new tree to last. Now what? Do I take all the lights off & have to pack it up to ship back? This is crazy. I called customer service but had to leave a message so hopefully they call me back tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: You do get what you pay for. The tree looks beautiful, however, my complaint is regarding the construction. The limbs are loosely attached via these tiny cheap hollow tubes that are secured only by hopes and dreams. Some limbs did not even come with these and were completely detached. For the price this is an excellent tree if you are wanting something affordable for a one-time use. A pet-peeve of mine is when you can see the pole through the branches and this tree was full enough that it wasn't an issue. If the manufacturer would re-think the hollow tubes thing then you would have a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for $131.99. For the price, the tree is very nice. It's packed very tightly and you need to have some patience to fluff it out so that it looks real. When first taking it out of the packaging, it doesn't seem very full. After rearranging the branches and such, it looks pretty good. See attached pictures. The tree comes in four pieces: the stand, the base section (largest), middle section, and top section. The top section of branches is not "hinged", so you'll want to follow the instructions for "wrapped trees" in the booklet. Basically, you have to bend the branches into place both laterally and horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awful tree.  Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Stand broke in half once the tree was assembled. Stand was unable to withstand the weight of the tree and snapped off. Complete waste of money and dangerous when it fell on a person.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Consider Others First
customer_reviews.text: There are better options out there. We’ve fluffed, and fluffed, and fluffed. You still have some pretty apparent spots with big gaps where you can see through. The bottom branches are a bit week and bend. We’re hoping it’ll last a couple years. Still very pretty and an eye catcher.
customer_reviews.author: R Mills

customer_reviews.title: Not close to advertised
customer_reviews.text: We are waiting now for UPS to pick up the tree. It is nothing like shown in the ad or video. Yes it works the same way, but the branches are few and far between. Reminded me of some of the cheap ones at discount stores. Not at all as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Marion the Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Not pre-lit but still a decent value and looks pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: The tree is very light and easy to move around. It comes in two pieces packaged very tightly so it does take a bit of time to get all of the branches arranged but once done it looks pretty nice. I permanently attached lights with zip ties (this took a few hours.) The picture shows 100 white plug-in lights and 2 - 64 colored LED battery operated strings. I attached the two pieces together at the trunk connection and plan to put it away fully assembled which should be pretty easy as this tree is very light. and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good value, one problem
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit harder to assemble than I was led to believe, and going to the website and watching a video of assembly was really helpful. The good stuff is that the tree looked much nicer than I expected, especially for the price. Once decorated, it was lovely. The problem was the "stand" at the bottom. One of the cross pieces arrived broken and that totally upset the balance of the tree and its ability to stand upright. I solved the problem with a wooden block. My welder daughter will fix it next year.
customer_reviews.author: balloons

customer_reviews.title: Best artificial Christmas tree I’ve ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: As a person who prefers real trees and definitely did not want a fake Christmas tree, I can honestly say that this tree is a pleasant surprise. It is tall and fluffy and looks beautiful all decorated. It is the best fake tree that I have ever seen, and it doesn’t have the big holes that most artificial trees have. I would definitely recommend this tree if you are thinking of purchasing a fake one. As much as I still love real trees, I do have to say that having a fake tree was a lot easier and a lot cleaner. I’m looking forward to putting it up again next year.
customer_reviews.author: AlissaA

customer_reviews.title: I would never order this again nor would I recommend anyone else purchase this item
customer_reviews.text: The picture is a lot fuller and prettier that in person. These are cheap all green plastic branches and you can see straight through the tree. I would never order this again nor would I recommend anyone else purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for my family of 4
customer_reviews.text: We got rid of a larger tree that was just taking up too much space in my garage through out the year. This one is a very good size when you put it together for Christmas and shrinks down very nicely when you put it away for the rest of the year. The quality of the tree is very good. Not quite as good as the very expensive trees but after you decorate it, it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The tree stand came cracked around the screw and while turning it became more cracked. The first layer of limbs I tried to work with, yes gently, the greenery came off in my hands. I did not like that the different levels just plopped down, on my head, instead of staying up so you could fluff the levels one at a time. They all just fell down. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great tree! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews prior to purchase. Some people like the time needed to shape the tree or fullness. I went ahead and ordered it. I am so so please! All trees take a lot of time the first time. The fullness is very good. I have never seen a tree that is perfect. I have so many lights and ornaments. I was so excited to accommodate 500!!!! lights on the tree! I was like a little kid. So many branch tips that will allow me to display all my precious memory decorations. I do own some heavy ornaments. They needed 2 branches to hold them. Anyone that dislikes this tree is foolish!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Z.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, was easy to put up by myself (a 5' woman). My kids and I fluffed out the tree pretty quickly. It was full enough, but not too full. I was able to easily put lights on it and there was enough room for lots of decorations, which is what I wanted. If you want a tree that you can't see into, this isn't for you. But if you plan to fill it to the brim with decor, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Taller and fuller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This 4-1/2 tree was taller and fuller than expected. We loved it! It was ordered for a Christmas out of town. With 2 strings of LED lights added and everyone bringing a few ornaments it looked lovely. I had expected to need to place it on a box draped in fabric like I do with my 4' tree at home but it was perfect on its own. We took extra care separating the branches for a natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Ebwells

customer_reviews.title: wow!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first fake tree in 26 years of marriage...lol..I was sick of dragging the real one out to the street and sweeping pine needles till June...super easy to assemble...take your time to fluff out all the branches..pour a cocktail or two to settle in for this task and play some Christmas music...but after that sit back and enjoy. Purchase a tree storage bag also...the box is HUGE.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Christmas tree. We’re moving into our first house this month and a Christmas tree was a must. I didn’t know what to expect with the price, but I had bought a small desk sized tree that was this brand previously. My biggest concerns were the needles shedding off or it not looking full enough; however, barely any needles shed and after fluffing the branches it turned out to be exactly like pictured. The hinged branches were a time saver when assembling the tree and I can’t imagine going to the kind where you put the individual branches on the “trunk”.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Great “clearance” price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tree in the “off season” (July) for $60. I am shocked that they could sell at that price, as it is normally priced closer to $275-300. I am super satisfied with the purchase. I took it out of the box, assembled to make sure all was there, & boxed back up. It was fast, straightforward, & easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: SUPREME ELEGANCE & BEAUTY IN AN AMAZING CHRISTMAS TREE!!
customer_reviews.text: I. Am. Beyond Thrilled... With this amazing tree. Not only was the $$ value exceptional, so is the quality AND EASE of assembly. I purchased the nine-foot beauty & it is four sections that are wonderfully manageable to assemble. It is sturdy & incredibly full & simply beautiful. Delivery was timely & spot on as usual with Amazon Prime & I am in love with our new family member who will provide countless Christmas blessings & memories far into our future. ❤️💚🙏🏻
customer_reviews.author: mama llama

customer_reviews.title: Best BANG for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Truly looks REAL! I paid under $100 and the tree is amazing. Read all the reviews and just as stated! Great tree for the money!
customer_reviews.author: AWilson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited for this Christmas tree!!! Bought it early before the holiday and tested it/put it up and it’s awesome! Easy to put together, the perfect size for my house, and the way it’s assembled will make it easy to fluff out vs some other fake trees I’ve seen before. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tree!
customer_reviews.text: First, my only complaint with the product is that the description was a bit misleading. I thought that storage box included meant that it would include an actual box for the tree parts, not the soggy cardboard box that it was mailed in. I’m less than thrilled that I’m stuck with the cardboard box. Otherwise, assembly is very easy and the tree looks very realistic. I found that the branches are sturdy for heavier ornaments; you just need to make sure you hang them further up the branch.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Good tree, perfect height fits nicely in our house
customer_reviews.text: Nice tall tree, perfect size for our house. Thought about returning it for a pre-lit tree, but I like the look and dont mind putting lights on. The branches are full, the tree is not a "slim" tree but I like that it is not too wide so it stands tall but doesn't take up too much room in out Living space. Good sturdy stand, 3 pieces so it is easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E. Keys

customer_reviews.title: Great tree for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st tree my husband and l bought in the last 5 years, so l was very leery about ordering one online! But when we got it out of the box, fluffed it up and stood back the tree was beautiful. It was a 7.5 ft. tree and we paid under $100.00 for it. In 1985 we bought a tree that was 7.5ft. and it was well over $400.00, and it wasn't even as nice as this one. This will be the last tree we buy so I'm really glad it was this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tree!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful and high quality Christmas tree! Exactly what my boyfriend and I wanted for our first tree together. It did look bushier in the photos than it does in real life, and the color doesn't match up. But it was very attractive when fully decorated, and we were satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ward

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Artificial Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: This was our first artificial tree purchase and so happy we did! It was absolutley beautiful! We had several people over during the holidays and no one believed this tree was artificial and requested the link/brand name. This tree is full and beautiful! No pineneedles to sweep up, no tree to water, and no worrying about lights on the tree being burnt out! We also used a frasier balsam wax melt to keep the holiday smell in our home. Cant wait to use this tree again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s super tall but definitely needs more branches not full enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppernico

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, run away!
customer_reviews.text: Worst tree ever. There were green needles All Over my floor just from assembling. This is the tree being fluffed, more needles all over. Looks nothing like the picture. Pure trickery. They refunded my money bc I sent it back immediately. Shocking anyone would make and sell something like this, Amazon should strongly consider not associating with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Brockus hake

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to pack away in the box it came in.
customer_reviews.text: A branch was found missing as I assembled it. It appeared bushy so no one else noticed once it was assembled. Looked very lifelike. The only other problem with it was it was difficult to repack in the box when it was time to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought this tree back in August. Back then, it sold for $200. I like that it's not pre-lit because I hate dealing with bulbs burning out. It was not hard to string lights on it. I think it took a total of 18 yards of lights total, but we got them fairly cheap from the local department store. It was a super easy set up, and we got so many compliments on it. We have a vaulted ceiling, so the picture attached is of our 9 foot tree in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great tree!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first artificial tree I have ever put up, so at first I was a bit skeptical. However, when I received the tree and began assembling it, I was very pleasantly surprised. It looked great! Very full and surprisingly real. there were barley any gaps, and if there were, I just adjusted the branches to fill it. The shape and width are also great, and the height off the floor is just enough. The branches are also pretty strong for those heavier ornaments. I highly recommend this tree. The quality surpasses the price compared to all the $100+ trees out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Great tree!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to buy a fake tree. A little skeptical, once we opened it up, and fluffed it, I ask myself, why did it take me forever to get one? This tree is perfect, easy to set up, needs to be "fluffed, we love it and recommend this to anyone who is looking for a fake tree! A zillion thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tree... really!
customer_reviews.text: This Artificial Christmas tree is absolutely amazing. For the price you get an extremely Full/Dense amount of branches with plenty of offshoots/branches. The tree is the perfect height and is FULL instead of narrow like most artificial trees these days. This is the traditional shape that everyone thinks of when picturing the classic 'Christmas Tree'. It comes shipped in three peices which are easy to assemble and the branches are hinged so they easily drop down into the correct configuration. Seriously, this is the perfect Artificial Tree and blows away those overly expensive crappy ones found at brick and mortar stores. A tree this quality should easily cost $300+ at hardware/department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: happy holiday
customer_reviews.text: For over 30 years I had a fresh real Christmas tree and this tree reminds me of it. I was sceptical of the artificial tree when I took it out of the box, but once I separated each branch it filled in nicely. The only issue I had was one branch was hanging off the centre stem and had to be taped back on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Such a good deal! The tree is the perfect height for ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this tree for 84 dollars. Such a good deal! The tree is the perfect height for my living room and it is so beautful. Set up was super easy and it only took about an hour for me to fluff everything out by myself. When fluffed, there are no gaps. The branches aren't the sturdiest, as I had one break on me during the setup/fluffing process but that was no biggie because then I knew which side was going to be the back! I have not yet put any ornaments on the tree, but I think it was such a good deal and will last me at least a few years. (excuse the haphazard lights in the pict
customer_reviews.author: Glenn CoCo

customer_reviews.title: Great tree for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tree! Normally we get a real tree but my husband and relatives have terrible allergies so I opted for a fake one this year. I was concerned it would look bad because of the price. It looks great! IT was super duper easy to assemble, comes neatly packed in a box and consists of 3 pieces. My cat unfortunately is constantly in it which flattens out the branches but they are super easy to fluff back up. Really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: The price on this tree was a steal. For the height and the style of the tree this should have been over $200. I would like to give it a better score but it's difficult to. There are a lot of bare spots in the tree no matter how much you "fluff" the branches. I think this is a great starter tree for a family or even if you are just getting a tree and you dislike the holidays. I wouldn't recommend it as the perfect tree in anyway though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great tree!
customer_reviews.text: Great tree. I grew up with a real tree every year. This is my first artificial tree. Looks just as real id say. Only thing you dont get the authentic smell. O yea and watering duties, loose pine needles, sap on your hands from moving it, and having to haul it in and out of your house every year. Ill sacrafice the great smell for the others lol because yankee candle can solve that for me anyways. Takes a while to fluff (me about an hour to get it to look how i wanted it) and i did loose some pine needles putting it up but overall a great and affordable tree.
customer_reviews.author: cristiansilva3312

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: This tree was so easy to set up, I was able to do it all by myself. I was surprised that it is actually 7.5 feet tall. It took forever to unfluff the branches but the tree is very full so it is worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tree for tiny apartments!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this little tree. It made our holidays perfect. As much as I love real trees the ones this size are quite expensive and we do not have the resources to cut one ourselves. This tree is rather full but it does take time to shape each individual branch and section. After some fluffing and lights it was gorgeous! Putting it away was easy as well. We squished all the branches back down and put it in the box it came in for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Davalos

customer_reviews.title: Not real looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product, easy to assemble. But I was very disappointed in that it does not look even close to real; the "needles" are a very thin plastic. Hopefully it will be better disguised when the lights and ornaments are on it. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Pleases with the purchase. First artificial tree we have had. Best advice I got was to go on YouTube and watch video about how to "fluff" an artificial tree. Takes a while to get the branches all arranged for best coverage, but if you follow the instructions and don't rush, it looks much better. Only took about 30 minutes for my wife and I working together.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good tree for the money
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. I am only 5’2” tall and have severe back issues. I easily put this together by myself with no stress on my back. Like any artificial tree you do need to spend time ‘fluffing’ the branches but when done it is a nice looking tree. The branches do feel a bit wobbly but it doesn’t affect the overall stability of the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Coton lover

customer_reviews.title: Nice, full Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with our tree, especially for the price that we paid (about $80). It is very full. I don't see any crazy gaps anywhere. The quality of the tree itself is good. The branches are sturdy metal. I also like that the base is made out of metal, instead of cheap plastic. Overall, I expect this tree to last my family several years. If you don't mind doing your own lights, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Tree works for Christmas. However, it filled the ...
customer_reviews.text: Tree works for Christmas. However, it filled the house with an irritant of the skin and respiratory system. Had to extensively clean entire house and basement (re: packaging) to rid of irritant.. Keep these issues in mind when purchasing. Sent to recycling, never to be seen by me again!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tree, works great in smaller space
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be an excellent investment. The tree went up really easily. It's not too heavy and just the right size for my not-too-large living room. I LOVE the fact that it does not have lights already installed on the tree. Previously pre-lighted trees stopped working after first Christmas. I used purchase lights and it looked gorgeous. It's very realistic looking and very full. I'm delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bicknell

customer_reviews.title: Great size for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tree was exactly what I hoped I was getting! When the box came I thought it would be smaller than advertised, but after opening the branches, it is just right. Branches are strong enough to hold heavy ornaments. Overall the tree is a little light so I was concerned it would tip over, but I’ve had no problem with that. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Gottahave

customer_reviews.title: Realistic looking! Easiest set up and worth fluffing!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tree in July but we put it up to see if we liked it! At first it’s sparse but when you getting fluffing it’s beautiful and very real looking! You cannot beat the ease of putting this tee up! Maybe five minutes to snap together and the fluffing time was worth it! Packed it away in minutes until the day after Thanksgiving comes your! Excellent value and beautiful quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This artificial tree is beauitiful
customer_reviews.text: We love this tree! It's so easy to assemble and take down! It's not heavy and being 4'11" I can carry it on my own. It's very sturdy and looks real once decorated. You can move the branches around to make a more real appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: I really love this tree!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a smaller tree to put on a table in front of my window and this one is perfect. It looks full and seems to be sturdy especially the stand. The tree I had before the stand was so flimsy. So I'm very pleased and the price was better than what I saw at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Harrold-Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased real trees, but figured id try an artificial this year, and i instantly regretted it as soon as i opened the box. For the price, this tree is awful. The branches shed as you're trying to fluff it. Looks so fake and it is smaller than ut says. Go to a store and actually look and feel the trees. You'll be disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Catia

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this tree for my college apartment and I am extremely happy with the purchase! It was easy to assemble, keep in mind that the tree branches will need to be fluffed out, but once they are the tree looks very full. No complaints and for the price I would easily buy again! I choose to go for an unlit tree because they were cheaper and it was easier to shop around for less expensive lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Never been a fan of artificial trees, but they are more economical nowadays. This tree was the perfect size and we were pleasantly surprised by how realistic it looked. We are happy with this tree and will use it for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Full and Beautiful Tree
customer_reviews.text: This tree is very tall and full. I love it and hope to use it for many years to come. There was a little bit of initial shedding while putting it together but that is to be expected with any tree. I highly recommend this tree. It is much better than some that are double the price.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyfromBama

customer_reviews.title: Great tree!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree! We were looking for a medium sized tree and this one is perfect. Super easy to assemble and looks great once it’s been fluffed and decorated. This is the 4 foot tall one.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Just gorgeous tree! Very easy to assemble and just a lovely tree. The price was a gift it was so reasonable. This tree received so many compliments, more then anything I loved that it was full, shaped perfect and tall!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas tree that makes the holidays easier
customer_reviews.text: I like this tree. It is easy to assemble. It takes a while to extend all of the branches but Once you finish spreading everything out it looks very full. I think I will realize a good value with this tree over the course of some years.
customer_reviews.author: Nobel M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this tree!!Full and just the right height!! Company could not stop talking about how pretty the tree was . Came earlier than they said. Would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl pratt

customer_reviews.title: The overall look of this tree is nice once you fluff it out sufficiently
customer_reviews.text: The overall look of this tree is nice once you fluff it out sufficiently. The reason for the two stars is we had 6 branches that were completely broken, all in the same area, and lots of dropped needles. We ended up just sort of sitting the broken branches inside the tree to fill the hole because we didn’t want to be without a tree but I think the quality control could’ve been better on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 6 foot tree. The tree itself is easy to assemble and looks great once finished. Prepare to do a lot of fluffing! My main concern is that the tree tilts a little bit after I hung all the ornaments. My old tree did this as well, though, so I'm not too worried. Also, the tree arrived with two middle pieces, a top piece, and no bottom section. But customer service quickly took care of the problem, and I have it up in plenty of time for Christmas. It is a lovely tree, and I recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Allergies with real tree!!
customer_reviews.text: After every year with real trees, my oldest boy, who’s got respiratory delicacies, and having bought a real tree already this year, we needed to get a FAKE TREE. But I gotta say, it’s fabulous. Right height. Right girth. Good fluff and fill. Just takes time to puff it out. But well worth the money. It’ll save a ton of dough over the years. Look up MOLD and junk on trees. It’s almost frightening.
customer_reviews.author: Bighead

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this artificial tree
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this artificial tree!! Highly recommended. This is my first fake tree ever because I always thought they looked like plastic. This is really beautiful and full, the color is a nice dark green not bright/cheap looking. The branches are full and sturdy enough for even our heaviest ornaments. I am a very happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherish O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tree, especiallyfor the price and convenience
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of getting an artificial tree but hesitant. Then we I saw the pricing at home depot and lowe's I said forget it. I decided to browse on Amazon and found this one which was inexpensive and looked nice enough. I am pleasantly surprised. It does take alot of primping but I put it together in minutes and continue to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J. Vail

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product - Not quite as full as expected, but it'll work fine.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Assemble & Disassemble. Bought a vinyl cover for the box since its going to be stored in the garage and don't want nasty beasties to assemble inside which would then be taken inside. HA.
customer_reviews.author: Haggis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tree
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tree, easy to assemble and to put up. Easy to take down and put back in the box. It was easy to walk around the entire tree and stringing up the lights. Pleasant to enjoy looking at this tree with the lights and decorations. Sure beats having to worry about a live tree, worrying about it dying before the holiday arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love that there was not much to put together except ...
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I received this tree. It was packaged perfectly. It is not skinny and cheap looking either. I love that there was not much to put together except two sticks. All you need to do is pull each branch down and fluff it. It was super quick and easy to put together and It will be the same to take down. I loved this purchase and was 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, full-branched, medium tree.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect medium sized tree for a smaller living room. It has lots of full branches and looks great. A breeze to set up and easy to decorate. Super glad I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Branch Length Was Weird
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to get this tree for Christmas 2019 and found the installation to be very simple. The issue we had was when it was installed, we found that the branch length on one section seemed to be out of order. Meaning that when it was installed, one of the sections had almost an hourglass profile with shorter branches being under longer branches so it looked really weird when it was put together. We had to return it since we couldn't figure out a way around it rather than to try and take apart the branches and swap them on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Jarret B Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great investment.
customer_reviews.text: My first non-foil artificial tree. It looks beautiful, and natural. When decorated I don't notice that it's artificial, and I don't have to worry about it drying out. Peace of mind is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: shelby koning

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tree for the money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great Christmas tree that we've enjoyed for many months. A little cheaply-made and fell apart in some places but it really looks good. Highly suggest for the value per dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Nessaka

customer_reviews.title: A great tree
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a full tree that looked elegant decorated and this one is that. We are real pleased with this tree. I didn't get the lighted one because it doesn't take long to put lights on. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Betz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love the tree. Still easy to use and store for the past 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Megheartsamazon

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this tree, I was skeptical at first as it was a last-minute decision and my "rebound" tree. This tree fluffed out BEAUTIFULLY, super FULL. Before my tree arrived I was looking at a similar tree in Target; worried for all the gaping gaps and spaces, I bought half a cart of mesh/ribbons/fillers. However, when my tree arrive it was so full— I was more worried that my ornaments wouldn't have enough space for it properly "hang." I am beyond happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tanii

customer_reviews.title: Great Tree!
customer_reviews.text: After 30+ years of real trees, we decided to go with a "fake" one. We couldn't be more pleased with this tree! It looks great and was easy to put up The price was good, and we are very happy with this tree
customer_reviews.author: bantcher

customer_reviews.title: Great tree for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I never wanted a fake Christmas tree, but circumstances leave me no choice. This tree was a great option. One of the sections was missing a branch. We called National Tree Company and they asked if we could hide that missing branch for now and send it back to be fixed after Christmas. They would cover the shipping both ways. Great way to handle the issue and we could start decorating the tree immediately.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE L.

customer_reviews.title: The tall height is perfect for my 2-story foyer
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this tree by myself in about 4 minutes from box to standing position. It took a few more minutes to spread out the individual branches, which is important to give it the fullness that you want. The tall height is perfect for my 2-story foyer, and it is a beautiful shape with ample width.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but can only hold lightweight ornametns
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tree for my office. I think overall the tree size and amount of branches was very good. However, the tree could have been sturdier. The branches did not have enough support to hold some of my heavier ornaments. Mostly it will take lighter weight type ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Reza

customer_reviews.title: Don't be in a hurry putting it up. take the time to fluff it and it will look great
customer_reviews.text: This was my first artificial Christmas tree after 50 years of real trees. I am very happy how this tree looks. Take the time to put it up and to fluff out the branches and you will be real pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Most Realistic Looking Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the most beautiful artificial tree we have ever had. It's full with strong limbs and just lovely. We will enjoy this tree for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: gramsdaley

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Looked in 5/6 different stores for a nice artificial Christmas tree! Wanting to spend Between 150-175 dollars ! Couldn’t find anything that looked good! Saw this and read reviews thought I would try it! Very easy to set up. Did by myself in about an hour ! My husband came home and was really impressed with how good it looked for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have it.
customer_reviews.text: The tree is a little more shiny than I had hoped. The green is deeper than in the picture. Once I fluffed it out (about 30 minutes, the first time) I started liking it more. I paid 100.00 before Christmas, I would probably buy it again. If you are buying the pre-lit tree. You must be computer savvy to register it. I called to get a replacement cap spike for storing the tree, the lady wanted me to register with the upc. Amazon did not include it in the p/l. She wanted me to scan the receipt. Also the box was damaged in the shipping process,not great for storing the tree after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cindee L.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. hands down.
customer_reviews.text: just opened this up and set it up :) tbh it is pretty great looks fantastic it takes a bit to shape it up but worth the money! i’m glad i got this one over other trees still needs some fluffing / shaping (like straightening out the top) but thoroughly pleased! i did lights myself hence why they aren’t perfect lol
customer_reviews.author: rebecca s

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Christmas Tree
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect little tree for a bay window. It is easy to assemble and sturdy. It looks nice and worth the money. I gave it four stars because it’s a not even in shape throughout however I am wondering if that might change as it’s out of the box longer. I would recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sht2350

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be more perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy a fake tree in general, even more online, but this was PERFECT! Doesn’t look fake, true to height, and it looks full! I was so happy with it, I showed my niece in Texas a picture and she ordered the same one and she loves it too! You won’t be disappointed with this! The key is to make sure u fluffy the tree good!!
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, had to separate the branches but that didn’t take long. Tree is very full and a great value for the price. Bought this to replace my previous artificial tree that lasted about 12 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly highly recommend....it will exceed you expectations
customer_reviews.text: Omg this tree is fantastic. There was a minor shipping delay due to mechanical truck issues, however. The quality of this tree made waiting totally worth it. It is gorgeous, full, and stands tall and straight! Very very happy with this purchase and what a fantastic price! Highly recommend will not disappoint. They def earned my business with this one
customer_reviews.author: brittany millard

customer_reviews.title: Quality tree
customer_reviews.text: This tree turned out great. I love it because it’s a lot lighter than my 35 year old one. Plus, I hung quite a few heavy ornaments on it. Once you finish “fluffing” the branches, it turns out very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: The tree was my first artificial one in a long time.. that being said I read many reviews before finally deciding on this tree. The tree was better than I expected honestly and once I did some fluffing, about 45 min all together. The shape and fullness was really nice. The only thing I did not like is that the material used is still “fake” looking to me. But for the price and how nice and full the tree looked I got over it and was happy with our tree this year.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product for an amazing price! No, it’s not the best fake tree you can buy but for less than $100 it is everything I wanted & more! I got recommended this free buy a friend and I am very happy with my purchase. I was nervous when first setting it up but with some major branch fluffing, it looked amazing! Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Santanna

customer_reviews.title: National Tree 7.5-Foot North Valley Spruce Tree,
customer_reviews.text: Finally we open the box and setup our tree for Christmas. It looks like a real tree. it is very easy to setup. we are very pleased to have it.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my purchase! This tree look much better then the ones I saw most of the big box retail store and you can’t beat the price! The 7 1/2 foot was perfect for our home.
customer_reviews.author: tyrone simpson

customer_reviews.title: ... ft trees and this one seems to be a good quality for the price - fills in quite nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had numerous fake 9 ft trees and this one seems to be a good quality for the price - fills in quite nicely and was easy enough to assemble. It does require fluffing of course. The whole assembly process itself took my husband and I about 2 hours, and it's not even decorated yet. But that's typical for a large fake tree. We will see how it holds up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaB

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.. full, sturdy, and beautiful tree!
customer_reviews.text: After procastinating and failing to find a tree in stores, i hesitantly browses through Amazon a s stumbled upon this one. I read the reviews amd crossed my fingers.. and I am actually really happy with it! I'm pretty impressed by how easy the set up was! Fluffing the tree was a little annoying, but that's going to happen with any artificial tree, and the payoff on this one was worth it.. It's really full looking! The tree is sturdy and it's beautiful. And the price is great for something that we will use year after year.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful and realistic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been amazed by how beautiful and realistic this tree looks. I wanted to get a tree tall enough for my ornaments, this was perfect in size. It was easy to shape, the website has a great video guide. I just love my tree and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wms.

product_meta.title: National Tree Company Artificial Christmas Tree | Includes Stand | North Valley Spruce - 9 ft
product_meta.description: Size:9-FeetThe Artificial North Valley Spruce Christmas tree trimmed with its hinged branch construction goes up fast, leaving more time for holiday cheer. Tree branches are attached at the center pole using a hinge system, with each branch lowered into position in preparation of final shaping. The tree decor is designed with a fire-resistant and non-allergenic material, making it a great accent piece wherever it is placed. A diameter of 65 inches at the base, it also includes a metal tree stand and assembly instructions. Lights, decorations and ornaments are not included.
feature_bullets: NATURAL LIFELIKE APPEAL: Our artificial branches look ultra-realistic and lifelike. With 2,128 individually crafted branch tips, this full bodied tree is as charming as the real thing.
SIMPLE SETUP AND STORAGE: Convenient hinged branches allow for easy setup and disassembly.
LASTING DURABILITY: Built to endure many holidays with its sturdy metal base, our time-tested needles are also fire resistant and non-allergenic.
IDEAL SIZING: Tree stands 9 feet tall and 65 inches in diameter at the base. For its most lush and full form, plan on taking 60-90 minutes to shape the tree.

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: National Tree Company is a USA-based family owned and operated business established 60 years ago. All of our products come with a limited 5 year warranty. Our friendly USA customer service staff will assist with product and parts' questions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,714 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
